member.name: P:StudentVueAPI.BrowserSession.ResponseUri
member.summary: The uri of the HTTP response

member.name: M:StudentVueAPI.BrowserSession.GET(System.String)
member.summary: Performs an HTTP GET request to a given URL. Returns the response body

member.name: M:StudentVueAPI.BrowserSession.POST(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Performs an HTTP POST request to a given URL with a given request body and content type. Returns the response body

member.summary: Adds the body content to the POST request

member.name: M:StudentVueAPI.BrowserSession.AddCookiesTo(System.Net.HttpWebRequest)
member.summary: Adds existing cookies to the request

member.name: M:StudentVueAPI.BrowserSession.SaveCookiesFrom(System.Net.HttpWebResponse)
member.summary: Saves new cookies from the response

member.name: M:StudentVueAPI.BrowserSession.ParseResponseBody(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the response body. Could also be a JSON body

member.summary: Returns a list of Course objects
